The other "Dead Island Riptide" torrent by HeroMaster worked for me at first, but then crashed every time after that (Win 7 x64). This one seems stable so far (played a few min, quit, reloaded from save, no crashing). The installer by default is in Russian, but the very first box that came up allowed me to change that to English. Also it is "pre-cracked", the full game + DLC. Thx.

If the game crashes for you:
Go to game "Options" "Online" ang change Gametype to Singleplayer and crashes have to stop.
